QuestData.Title: Know No Fear
QuestData.Description: Now that we have the teleporter open, my plan is quite complex... it has several facets and will take impeccable coordination. And there are supplies to be gathered! And troops to recruit! Likely, weeks of hard labor as well!$B$BHahah, I had you going there for a moment, didn't I? You've got this, kid. Hop through the teleporter and take the fight to them! Our sappers will back you up... they won't have anywhere to run.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ricket at K3 wants you to kill 6 Garm Watchers and 8 Snowblind Devotees.
QuestData.CompletionText: Nothing strikes fear into the enemy quite like a goblin sapper!
QuestData.RewardText: Haha! That'll teach those brutes to waste our time. From this day forth, green skin will strike fear into the hearts of all magnataur!
